articles.description: Apple won't be left in the dust when it comes to artificial intelligence.
articles.content: New reports show that Apple(AAPL 0.45%) is testing its own ChatGPT-style product, and with a single launch it could reach over a billion users. Better yet, Apple can now lean on open-source models. I… [+192 chars]
